siteMetadata.subtitle: Data Engineer @ Fossil. I blog about web development, machine learning, data engineering and more.

frontmatter.title: Python - Churn prediction with Graphlab
frontmatter.description: Churn prediction is the task of identifying whether users are likely to stop using a service, product, or website. With Graphlab toolkit, you can start with raw (or processed) usage metrics and accurately forecast the probability that a given customer will churn.
